Utility Headings

Base Reset Base Typography Base Forms Base Buttons Base Tables Utility Layout Utility Typography Utility White Space Utility Responsive States UI Utility Button Sizes UI Utility Groups UI Utility Disclosure States Positions Grid Table Object Color Base Color Forms Color Forms Dark Color Tables Color Buttons Colors Color Borders Flex Object Utility Headings Background Images
 

basscss-utility-headings v0.0.6 Optional

Utility Headings

NPM Github

basscss.com

Use .h0 and .h00 to create headings larger than the default h1. Add .h0-responsive or h00-responsive to use vw based sizes at larger viewports. Adjust the width of the browser to see the difference.

Hamburger 00

Hamburger 0

Hamburger 1

<h1 class="h00 h00-responsive">Hamburger 00</h1>
<h1 class="h0 h0-responsive">Hamburger 0</h1>
<h1 class="h1 h1-responsive">Hamburger 1</h1>
